thread.title: Warren Buffett's favourite valuation measure signals stock markets are overvalued
thread.title_full: Warren Buffett's favourite valuation measure signals stock markets are overvalued

author: Kyle Caldwell
title: Warren Buffett's favourite valuation measure signals stock markets are overvalued
text: Why Britain's 'best fund' took a tumble Warren Buffett’s favourite valuation measure signals stock markets are overvalued A valuation measure that called the tech bubble is flashing a warning signal on two of the world’s biggest stock markets Warren Buffett has returned 20pc a year since 1965
